code: import React from"react";import{Search}from"react-feather";import{ReactComponent as Logo}from"../images/utensils.svg";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=_ref=>{let{showRecipeForm,searchTerm,updateSearchTerm,displayAllRecipes}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo-search",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Logo,{onClick:displayAllRecipes}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"visually-hidden",htmlFor:"search",children:"Search"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Search",id:"search",value:searchTerm,onChange:e=>updateSearchTerm(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Search,{})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"header-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"My Favorite Recipes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"new-recipe",onClick:showRecipeForm,children:"Add New Recipe"})]})]});};export default Header;
